expt_aim: how confusing the english language can be
sent2: I really enjoy walking in the woods alone.
I really don't like eating out at upscale places..
He thought the cookie was good.
She liked but didn't love the shirt.
All of the movies were funny.
The student was either tired or hungry.
Two but not three of the weekends were sunny.
sent1: I really enjoy going sailing with my father.
The players were sometimes but not always skillful.
He thought the cookie was excellent.
Some of the movies were funny.
The student was tired or hungry.
Three of the weekends were sunny.
